verses.verse: <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5648>made<s%> a <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H3900>feast<s%> to a <S%H506>thousand<s%> of his <S%H7261>lords<s%>, and <S%H8355>drank<s%> <S%H2562>wine<s%> <S%H6903>before<s%> the <S%H506>thousand<s%>.

<S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%>, whiles he <S%H2942>tasted<s%> the <S%H2562>wine<s%>, <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H858>bring<s%> the <S%H1722>golden<s%> and <S%H3702>silver<s%> <S%H3984>vessels<s%> which his <S%H2>father<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had <S%H5312>taken<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> which was in <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>; that the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and his <S%H7261>princes<s%>, his <S%H7695>wives<s%>, and his <S%H3904>concubines<s%>, might <S%H8355>drink<s%> therein. father: or, grandfather taken: Cald. brought forth

<S%H116>Then<s%> they <S%H858>brought<s%> the <S%H1722>golden<s%> <S%H3984>vessels<s%> that were <S%H5312>taken<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> which was at <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>; and the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and his <S%H7261>princes<s%>, his <S%H7695>wives<s%>, and his <S%H3904>concubines<s%>, <S%H8355>drank<s%> in them.

They <S%H8355>drank<s%> <S%H2562>wine<s%>, and <S%H7624>praised<s%> the <S%H426>gods<s%> of <S%H1722>gold<s%>, and of <S%H3702>silver<s%>, of <S%H5174>brass<s%>, of <S%H6523>iron<s%>, of <S%H636>wood<s%>, and of <S%H69>stone<s%>.

In the same <S%H8160>hour<s%> came <S%H5312>forth<s%> <S%H677>fingers<s%> of a <S%H606>man's<s%> <S%H3028>hand<s%>, and <S%H3790>wrote<s%> over <S%H6903>against<s%> the <S%H5043>candlestick<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H1528>plaister<s%> of the <S%H3797>wall<s%> of the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H1965>palace<s%>: and the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H2370>saw<s%> the <S%H6447>part<s%> of the <S%H3028>hand<s%> that <S%H3790>wrote<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H2122>countenance<s%> was <S%H8133>changed<s%>, and his <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> him, so that the <S%H7001>joints<s%> of his <S%H2783>loins<s%> were <S%H8271>loosed<s%>, and his <S%H755>knees<s%> <S%H5368>smote<s%> <S%H1668>one<s%> against <S%H1668>another<s%>. countenance: Cald. brightnesses was changed: Cald. changed it joints: or, girdles: Cald. bindings, or, knots

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7123>cried<s%> <S%H2429>aloud<s%> to <S%H5954>bring<s%> in the <S%H826>astrologers<s%>, the <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%>, and the <S%H1505>soothsayers<s%>. And the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spake<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%> to the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>, <S%H606>Whosoever<s%> <S%H3606><s%> shall <S%H7123>read<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3792>writing<s%>, and <S%H2324>shew<s%> me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof, shall be <S%H3848>clothed<s%> with <S%H711>scarlet<s%>, and have a <S%H2002>chain<s%> of <S%H1722>gold<s%> <S%H5922>about<s%> his <S%H6676>neck<s%>, and shall be the <S%H8523>third<s%> <S%H7981>ruler<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>. aloud: Cald. with might scarlet: or, purple

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H5954>came<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H2445>wise<s%> men: but they <S%H3546>could<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H7123>read<s%> the <S%H3792>writing<s%>, nor make <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof.

<S%H116>Then<s%> was <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> <S%H7690>greatly<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%>, and his <S%H2122>countenance<s%> was <S%H8133>changed<s%> in <S%H5922>him<s%>, and his <S%H7261>lords<s%> were <S%H7672>astonied<s%>. countenance: Cald. brightnesses

Now the <S%H4433>queen<s%>, by <S%H6903>reason<s%> of the <S%H4406>words<s%> of the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H7261>lords<s%>, <S%H5954>came<s%> into the <S%H4961>banquet<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%>: and the <S%H4433>queen<s%> <S%H6032>spake<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H2418>live<s%> for <S%H5957>ever<s%>: let <S%H409>not<s%> thy <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H927>trouble<s%> thee, nor let thy <S%H2122>countenance<s%> be <S%H8133>changed<s%>:

There <S%H383>is<s%> a <S%H1400>man<s%> in thy <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, in whom is the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods<s%>; and in the <S%H3118>days<s%> of thy <S%H2>father<s%> <S%H5094>light<s%> and <S%H7924>understanding<s%> and <S%H2452>wisdom<s%>, like the <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> of the <S%H426>gods<s%>, was <S%H7912>found<s%> in him; whom the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> thy <S%H2>father<s%>, the <S%H4430>king<s%>, I say, thy <S%H2>father<s%>, <S%H6966>made<s%> <S%H7229>master<s%> of the <S%H2749>magicians<s%>, <S%H826>astrologers<s%>, <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%>, and <S%H1505>soothsayers<s%>; father: or, grandfather

Forasmuch <S%H6903>as<s%> <S%H3606><s%> an <S%H3493>excellent<s%> <S%H7308>spirit<s%>, and <S%H4486>knowledge<s%>, and <S%H7924>understanding<s%>, <S%H6590>interpreting<s%> of <S%H2493>dreams<s%>, and <S%H263>shewing<s%> of hard <S%H280>sentences<s%>, and <S%H8271>dissolving<s%> of <S%H7001>doubts<s%>, were <S%H7912>found<s%> in the same <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, whom the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7761>named<s%> <S%H8036><s%> <S%H1096>Belteshazzar<s%>: <S%H3705>now<s%> let <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> be <S%H7123>called<s%>, and he will <S%H2324>shew<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>. interpreting: or, of an interpreter dissolving: or, of a dissolver doubts: Cald. knots

<S%H116>Then<s%> was <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> brought <S%H5954>in<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>. And the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spake<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> unto <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, Art <S%H607>thou<s%> that <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, which art <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1123>children<s%> of the <S%H1547>captivity<s%> of <S%H3061>Judah<s%>, whom the <S%H4430>king<s%> my <S%H2>father<s%> <S%H858>brought<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H3061>Jewry<s%>? father: or, grandfather

I have even <S%H8086>heard<s%> of thee, that the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H426>gods<s%> is in <S%H5922>thee<s%>, and that <S%H5094>light<s%> and <S%H7924>understanding<s%> and <S%H3493>excellent<s%> <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> is <S%H7912>found<s%> in thee.

And <S%H3705>now<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men, the <S%H826>astrologers<s%>, have been <S%H5954>brought<s%> in <S%H6925>before<s%> me, that they should <S%H7123>read<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3792>writing<s%>, and make <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof: but they <S%H3546>could<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H2324>shew<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H4406>thing<s%>:

And <S%H576>I<s%> have <S%H8086>heard<s%> of <S%H5922>thee<s%>, that thou <S%H3202>canst<s%> <S%H6590>make<s%> <S%H6591>interpretations<s%>, and <S%H8271>dissolve<s%> <S%H7001>doubts<s%>: <S%H3705>now<s%> <S%H2006>if<s%> thou <S%H3202>canst<s%> <S%H7123>read<s%> the <S%H3792>writing<s%>, and make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof, thou shalt be <S%H3848>clothed<s%> with <S%H711>scarlet<s%>, and have a <S%H2002>chain<s%> of <S%H1722>gold<s%> <S%H5922>about<s%> thy <S%H6676>neck<s%>, and shalt be the <S%H8531>third<s%> <S%H7981>ruler<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>. make interpretations: Cald. interpret, etc

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, Let thy <S%H4978>gifts<s%> <S%H1934>be<s%> to thyself, and <S%H3052>give<s%> thy <S%H5023>rewards<s%> to <S%H321>another<s%>; <S%H1297>yet<s%> I will <S%H7123>read<s%> the <S%H3792>writing<s%> unto the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and make <S%H3046>known<s%> to him the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>. rewards: or, fee

O <S%H607>thou<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%>, the most <S%H5943>high<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H3052>gave<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> thy <S%H2>father<s%> a <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H7238>majesty<s%>, and <S%H3367>glory<s%>, and <S%H1923>honour<s%>:

And <S%H4481>for<s%> the <S%H7238>majesty<s%> that he <S%H3052>gave<s%> him, <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H5972>people<s%>, <S%H524>nations<s%>, and <S%H3961>languages<s%>, <S%H1934>trembled<s%> <S%H2112><s%> and <S%H1763>feared<s%> <S%H4481>before<s%> <S%H6925>him<s%>: whom he <S%H1934>would<s%> <S%H6634><s%> he <S%H1934>slew<s%> <S%H6992><s%>; and whom he <S%H1934>would<s%> <S%H6634><s%> he kept <S%H1934>alive<s%> <S%H2418><s%>; and whom he <S%H1934>would<s%> <S%H6634><s%> he set <S%H1934>up<s%> <S%H7313><s%>; and whom he <S%H1934>would<s%> <S%H6634><s%> he put <S%H1934>down<s%> <S%H8214><s%>.

But when his <S%H3825>heart<s%> was lifted <S%H7313>up<s%>, and his <S%H7308>mind<s%> <S%H8631>hardened<s%> in <S%H2103>pride<s%>, he was <S%H5182>deposed<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> his <S%H4437>kingly<s%> <S%H3764>throne<s%>, and they <S%H5709>took<s%> his <S%H3367>glory<s%> from <S%H4481>him<s%>: in pride: or, to deal proudly deposed: Cald. made to come down

And he was <S%H2957>driven<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H1123>sons<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%>; and his <S%H3825>heart<s%> was <S%H7739>made<s%> <S%H5974>like<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%>, and his <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> was with the wild <S%H6167>asses<s%>: they <S%H2939>fed<s%> him with <S%H6211>grass<s%> like <S%H8450>oxen<s%>, and his <S%H1655>body<s%> was <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>; <S%H5705>till<s%> he <S%H3046>knew<s%> that the most <S%H5943>high<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H7990>ruled<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%>, and that he <S%H6966>appointeth<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> it <S%H4479>whomsoever<s%> he <S%H6634>will<s%>. his heart: or, he made his heart equal, etc

And <S%H607>thou<s%> his <S%H1247>son<s%>, O <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%>, hast <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H8214>humbled<s%> thine <S%H3825>heart<s%>, <S%H6903>though<s%> thou <S%H3046>knewest<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%>;

But hast lifted <S%H7313>up<s%> thyself <S%H5922>against<s%> the <S%H4756>Lord<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>; and they have <S%H858>brought<s%> the <S%H3984>vessels<s%> of his <S%H1005>house<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> thee, and <S%H607>thou<s%>, and thy <S%H7261>lords<s%>, thy <S%H7695>wives<s%>, and thy <S%H3904>concubines<s%>, have <S%H8355>drunk<s%> <S%H2562>wine<s%> in them; and thou hast <S%H7624>praised<s%> the <S%H426>gods<s%> of <S%H3702>silver<s%>, and <S%H1722>gold<s%>, of <S%H5174>brass<s%>, <S%H6523>iron<s%>, <S%H636>wood<s%>, and <S%H69>stone<s%>, which <S%H2370>see<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%>, <S%H3809>nor<s%> <S%H8086>hear<s%>, <S%H3809>nor<s%> <S%H3046>know<s%>: and the <S%H426>God<s%> in whose <S%H3028>hand<s%> thy <S%H5396>breath<s%> is, and whose are <S%H3606>all<s%> thy <S%H735>ways<s%>, hast thou <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H1922>glorified<s%>:
<S%H116>Then<s%> was the <S%H6447>part<s%> of the <S%H3028>hand<s%> <S%H7972>sent<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H6925>him<s%>; and <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3792>writing<s%> was <S%H7560>written<s%>.
And <S%H1836>this<s%> is the <S%H3792>writing<s%> that was <S%H7560>written<s%>, <S%H4484>MENE<s%>, <S%H4484>MENE<s%>, <S%H8625>TEKEL<s%>, <S%H6537>UPHARSIN<s%>.
<S%H1836>This<s%> is the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H4406>thing<s%>: <S%H4484>MENE<s%>; <S%H426>God<s%> hath <S%H4483>numbered<s%> thy <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H8000>finished<s%> it.
<S%H8625>TEKEL<s%>; Thou art <S%H8625>weighed<s%> in the <S%H3977>balances<s%>, and art <S%H7912>found<s%> <S%H2627>wanting<s%>.
<S%H6537>PERES<s%>; Thy <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is <S%H6537>divided<s%>, and <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H4076>Medes<s%> and <S%H6540>Persians<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H560>commanded<s%> <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%>, and they <S%H3848>clothed<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> with <S%H711>scarlet<s%>, and put a <S%H2002>chain<s%> of <S%H1722>gold<s%> <S%H5922>about<s%> his <S%H6676>neck<s%>, and made a <S%H3745>proclamation<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> him, that he should <S%H1934>be<s%> the <S%H8531>third<s%> <S%H7990>ruler<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>.
In that <S%H3916>night<s%> was <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> of the <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H6992>slain<s%>.

And <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4077>Median<s%> <S%H6902>took<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, being about <S%H8361>threescore<s%> and <S%H8648>two<s%> <S%H8140>years<s%> <S%H1247>old<s%>. being: Cald. he as the son of, etc about: or, now
